name: @vladmandic/sdnext
description: SD.Next: All-in-one WebUI for AI generative image and video creation
author: Vladimir Mandic <mandic00@live.com>

scripts.packages: . venv/bin/activate && pip install --upgrade transformers accelerate huggingface_hub safetensors tokenizers peft pytorch_lightning pylint ruff
scripts.pylint: . venv/bin/activate && pylint --disable=W0511 *.py modules/ pipelines/ scripts/ extensions-builtin/ | grep -v '^*'
scripts.pylint-win: venv\scripts\activate && pylint --disable=W0511 *.py modules/ pipelines/ scripts/ extensions-builtin/
scripts.lint: npm run format && npm run eslint && npm run eslint-ui && npm run ruff && npm run pylint | grep -v TODO
scripts.lint-win: npm run format-win && npm run eslint && npm run eslint-ui && npm run ruff-win && npm run pylint-win
